name: Pigment (Spectrum-art)
description:
This is a prototype for a game concept in which the main character walks through the art of their late, estranged uncle's collection, learning what kind of man he was, and why they were never allowed to meet.

This first level design explores 'The Garden of Earthly Delights' painted in the early 1500's by Hieronymus Bosch.
Players should note that this painting contains various depictions of nudity and violence, and so may not be suitable for all audiences.

The full version of the game would include story/RPG elements, as well as a few more mechanics for completing levels, and in-fiction dialogue from characters in the various works of art.
There are currently no plans to continue development on this project, but as this is my first game, I'd love to hear your feedback in the comments below! Thanks!

Play the web version above at medium resolution, or download Pigment_x86.zip to play on your desktop in HD.
